code: import{Button,Typography}from'@mui/material';import'./Game.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DecisionButton=_ref=>{let{option,stats,onClick}=_ref;const determineIfClickable=()=>{if(!option.requirements){return false;}for(const requirement of option.requirements){if(stats[requirement.stat]<requirement.value){return true;}}return false;};const getRequirements=()=>{if(!option.requirements){return'';}const requirementList=option.requirements.map((requirement,index)=>`(${requirement.stat}: ${requirement.value})`);return`: Requires ${requirementList.join(', ')}`;};const handleClick=()=>{onClick();};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"primary",disabled:determineIfClickable(),onClick:handleClick,className:"decision-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{children:[option.text,getRequirements()]})});};export default DecisionButton;
